text: Futhi siyosusa konke okusezifubeni zabo okungamagqubu, kuyogeleza ngaphansi kwabo imifula futhi bayothi “udumo lungolukaMvelinqangi okunguyena owasiholela kulokhu futhi besingeke siholeke ukube uMvelinqangi akazange asihole” ngempela zafika izithunywa zeNkosi yethu neqiniso futhi bayobizwa (kuthiwe) “lesisivande kwenziwe ukuthi nisizuze njengefa ngenxa yalokho enanikwenza”
